languages.text: Корабль Вольного Торговца также защищен {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитами{/g}. Если противник атакует вас с той стороны, где щиты ослаблены или полностью сбиты, корабль получит {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}.

The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} is likewise protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Корабль Вольного Торговца также защищен {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитами{/g}. Если противник атакует вас с той стороны, где щиты ослаблены или полностью сбиты, корабль получит {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's flagship is likewise protected by shields. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take damage.
The Rogue Trader's flagship is likewise protected by shields. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take damage.
The Rogue Trader's flagship is likewise protected by shields. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take damage.

The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} is likewise protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} de tu Comerciante Independiente también está protegida por {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g}. Si el enemigo te ataca desde un lado en el que los escudos están debilitados o agotados, la nave sufrirá {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daños{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} is likewise protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} de tu Comerciante Independiente también está protegida por escudos. Si el enemigo te ataca desde un lado en el que los escudos están debilitados o agotados, la nave sufrirá daños.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}も同様に{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}で守られている。シールドが弱まったり、消耗している側を敵に攻撃された場合、船は{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} is likewise protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}も同様にシールドで守られている。シールドが弱まったり、消耗している側を敵に攻撃された場合、船はダメージを受ける。

languages.text: 行商浪人的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}同样受到{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}保护。您的旗舰护盾耗尽之后，如果继续遭到攻击，您的旗舰就会承受{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} is likewise protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}同样受到护盾保护。您的旗舰护盾耗尽之后，如果继续遭到攻击，您的旗舰就会受到损害。

languages.text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} des Freihändlers ist ebenfalls durch {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} geschützt. Wenn der Gegner dich von einer Seite angreift, an der die Schilde geschwächt oder aufgebraucht sind, nimmt das Schiff {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} is likewise protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} des Freihändlers ist ebenfalls durch Schilde geschützt. Wenn der Gegner dich von einer Seite angreift, an der die Schilde geschwächt oder aufgebraucht sind, nimmt das Schiff Schaden.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} du Libre-Marchand est également protégé par des {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g}. Si l'ennemi vous attaque sur un flanc où les boucliers sont affaiblis ou épuisés, le vaisseau subira des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} is likewise protected by {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}. If the enemy attacks you from a side where the shields are weakened or depleted, the ship will take {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} du Libre-Marchand est également protégé par des boucliers. Si l'ennemi vous attaque sur un flanc où les boucliers sont affaiblis ou épuisés, le vaisseau subira des dégâts.
